articles.content:

articles.title: Looks Like Xbox Mini Fridge Orders Are Being Delayed (Again) - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: Deliveries on Xbox Mini Fridge preorders placed in August have been delayed until the end of October, according to an email from JB Hi-Fi.
articles.content:
I regret to inform you that Xbox Mini Fridge orders placed through JB Hi-Fi appear to have been delayed yet again.

articles.title: Australia to set aside at least 30% of its land mass to protect endangered species - Reuters
articles.description: Australia will set aside at least 30% of its land mass for conservation in a bid to protect plants and animals in the island continent famed for species found nowhere else in the world, Environment Minister Tanya Plibersek said on Tuesday.
